title: New: Lukid – P
body:
I’ve realised I probably spend more time endlessly rummaging through **Lukid**’s [facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LukidMusic) photos than I do listening to his music. Although insultingly disproportionate to my listening time, I would still recommend checking them out, they’re pretty fucking funny.

Anyway, a brand new cut emerged on **Lukid’**s soundcloud a couple of days ago, entitled _P_. It’s a rapturous, stumbling and disemboweled series of sounds that remarkably manages to build to something rather tantalizing in scale, despite its beginnings as essentially a cluster fuck of sound.

stream it below.
